    • About Shane & Clint Neal


    Clint & Shane Neal, owners of the Neal & Neal Team at Keller Williams Realty, have been growing a rental portfolio, building houses, and flipping properties since 2014. Focusing on the investment side of real estate has allowed them to spin off and create another company, Neal Bros, LLC. Building this brand and company is of utmost importance to bridge the gap between agents and investment opportunities in real estate. They are out-of-the-box thinkers when it comes to creating a win-win situation for all parties involved. If you have a property that needs a lot of work or is in a distressed situation, they would love to earn your business.

    Shane & Clint Neal
